name: HENTAI MINESWEEPER
detailed_description:
The villain gathered from all over the world the most beautiful girls and mined them in the tower of paradox. Your task is to clear them without damaging
This is a strategy game developing logic and care as well as not a bad time killer . In the game you are waited for by many levels with constantly increasing complexity
Game rules:
The number in the cell indicates how many mines are hidden around the cell . This number will help you understand where the safe cells are and where the bombs are.
If there is an empty cell next to an open cell, it will open automatically.
If you open a cell with a mine, the game is lost..
To mark the cell in which the bomb is located, right-click it.
In the game:
Cute arts
Gallery with pictures of completed levels.
Good music
Dynamic atmosphere
Progress
Leaders

Future:
Trading cards.
In this project I put a piece of the soul and I hope if you multiply it by your activity in the community, the gods will hear us and
I can please you with trading cards....

short_description: Legendary game "minesweeper" in a unique performance and atmosphere
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
